import React from "react"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { fetchBillData } from "../store/actions"; import persianJs from "persianjs"; import moment from "jalali-moment"; import waterBillLogo from "../asset/img/Ab-o-Fazelab-01.svg"; const WaterTemplate = ()=> { const billData = useSelector(state=> state. GetBillReducer.data) const timeConverter = (time) => { const engDate = moment(time * 1000).format("YYYY/MM/DD"); const perSianDate = persianJs( moment(`${engDate}`, "YYYY/MM/DD").locale("fa").format("YYYY/MM/DD") ).englishNumber()._str; return perSianDate; }; const persionConvertor = (data) => { const persian = persianJs(`${data}`).englishNumber()._str; return persian; }; const translateNumber = (num) => { const translatedNum = persianJs(num).digitsToWords().toString(); return translatedNum; }; return (
{billData.companyTitle}
:

{ persionConvertor(billData.companyArea)}

:

:

:

:

{ persionConvertor(billData.tariffCodeType)}

:

{ persionConvertor(billData.zipCode)}

:

{billData.address}

:

:

{ persionConvertor(billData.zipCode)}

:

{ timeConverter(billData.issueDate)}

:

:

undef undef

{ timeConverter(billData.previousReading)} { timeConverter(billData.currentReading)}
{ persionConvertor(billData.previousConsumption)} { persionConvertor(billData.currentConsumption)}
{ persionConvertor(billData.contractualCapacity)} { persionConvertor(billData.factoryID)} { persionConvertor(billData.meterStatus)}
()


{ persionConvertor(billData.cost)}
{ persionConvertor(billData.toll)}
{ persionConvertor(billData.tax)}
{ persionConvertor(billData.insurance)}


{ persionConvertor(billData.debt)}
{ persionConvertor(billData.totalBillingPeriod)}
( )

); } const mapStateToProps = ({ GetBillReducer }) => { return { billData: GetBillReducer.data, }; }; export default WaterTemplate; // export default connect(mapStateToProps, { // fetchBillData, // })(WaterTemplate);
